description: Amendments to planning permission dated 21st June 2022 (RN: 22/00542/FULL) for, 'Use of the building as a private members' club (sui generis) comprising office space and bedroom accommodation with ancillary functions and a publicly accessible restaurant / bar (sui generis) at part ground and basement levels. Erection of a new sixth floor and creation of terraces at rear first, fourth, fifth and new sixth floor level. Installation of plant with associated screening at sixth floor level and alterations to the elevations to include the installation of new shopfronts on the Brewer Street and Warwick Street elevations'; Namely, to vary the wording of Condition 16 to extend the hours that the terraces can be used to between 09.00 and 23.00 daily.
site_name: Regency House1-4 Warwick StreetLondonW1B 5LT
